content.user_title: Generate viral Defou x Stanley content from TopHub trends
content.value_statement: This skill automates content creation by fetching trending topics from TopHub and generating viral Defou x Stanley style articles using AI. It selects the top 10 topics with the highest viral potential and creates three content versions per topic.
actual_capabilities: Fetch real-time hot trends from TopHub platform
Select top 10 topics with highest viral potential using AI analysis
Generate three content versions per topic: Stanley style, Defou style, and Combo style
Apply proven viral content frameworks with hooks, scoring, and publishing advice
Save all generated content to organized markdown files with metadata
Process topics in parallel with rate limiting for efficient execution
limitations: Requires Anthropic API key for AI content generation
Content style is optimized for Chinese social media platforms
Topic selection is limited to TopHub source only

faq.question: What API key do I need?
faq.answer: You need an Anthropic API key configured in your .env file as ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.

faq.question: How many topics are selected?
faq.answer: The skill analyzes the top 50 trending items and selects the 10 with highest viral potential.

faq.question: What content styles are generated?
faq.answer: Three versions per topic: Stanley Style (viral), Defou Style (deep insight), and Combo (best of both).

faq.question: Where are results saved?
faq.answer: Generated content is saved to outputs/defou-stanley-posts/ as markdown files.

faq.question: Can I test without API calls?
faq.answer: Yes, set MOCK_MODE=true in your .env file to run in test mode without using API credits.

faq.question: What rate limiting is applied?
faq.answer: The skill uses p-limit with 2 concurrent requests to prevent API rate limiting.
